column3:
Uin Nee could use some assistance in granting the heart's desire of a young Mord.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Slay an anemone north of Lydha Lran and obtain a wriggling tendril.
Deliver the wriggling tendril to Uin Nee.

So, I was playing in a Mordling's dream the other day─yes, yes, hello to you, too─and he starts talking about wanting to eat a “whole bucketful of wrigglers”! And I said I could make that happen, helpful Dreamspinner that I am, though I had absolutely no idea what he was on about...

Well, as it turns out, wrigglers─an <Emphasis>extraordinarily</Emphasis> weird sort of worm, apparently─aren't easy to come by in Il Mheg. By which I mean that we don't have any at all, let alone a bucket's worth!
Not to worry, though! If I just work a little bit of magic on something sufficiently wiggly, it should come to the same thing. Approximately. Probably.
Either way, we won't know until we try! Which is why I need you to fetch me the wiggly bit of an anemone. The sooner the better, favorite mortal of mine!
By the undulating of that sack, I take it you've snagged what we need!
Perfect! Oooh, that is positively disgusting!
With a few minor adjustments, I should have no trouble making this into a dream-wriggler. None at all! Now, where did I put that phlegm I've been saving...
